mapper.select: select a.ano, /*경매 번호*/ seller, /*판매자 회원번호*/ s.mid as sellerNm, /*판매자 아이디*/ title, /*판매 제목*/ content, /*판매내용*/ vcate, /*카테고리*/ pay_start, /*판매 시작가*/ start_day, /*판매 시작일*/ last_day, /*판매 종료일*/ buyer, /*낙찰자 회원번호*/ b.mid as buyerNm, /*낙찰자 아이디*/ pay_max , /*최고가*/ status /*판매 상태*/ from auction a left join user s on a.seller = s.mno left join user b on a.buyer = b.mno left join video v on a.ano = v.ano where 1 = 1 and status = "판매중" order by start_day desc LIMIT 4

select a.ano, /*경매 번호*/ seller, /*판매자 회원번호*/ s.mid as sellerNm, /*판매자 아이디*/ title, /*판매 제목*/ content, /*판매내용*/ vcate, /*카테고리*/ pay_start, /*판매 시작가*/ start_day, /*판매 시작일*/ last_day, /*판매 종료일*/ buyer, /*낙찰자 회원번호*/ b.mid as buyerNm, /*낙찰자 아이디*/ pay_max , /*최고가*/ status /*판매 상태*/ from auction a left join user s on a.seller = s.mno left join user b on a.buyer = b.mno left join video v on a.ano = v.ano where 1 = 1 and status = "판매중" order by last_day asc LIMIT 4
